channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Informix JDBC
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Informix JDBC

item.title: CVE-2023-27866|2023-06-28T15:41:11.062Z -- ibm -- informix%20jdbc
item.description: IBM Informix JDBC Driver 4.10 and 4.50 is susceptible to remote code execution attack via JNDI injection when driver code or the application using the driver do not verify supplied LDAP URL in Connect String. IBM X-Force ID: 249511.

item.title: CVE-2023-35895|2023-12-20T14:18:56.529Z -- ibm -- informix%20jdbc
item.description: IBM Informix JDBC Driver 4.10 and 4.50 is susceptible to remote code execution attack via JNDI injection when passing an unchecked argument to a certain API. IBM X-Force ID: 259116.
